name: Archer
description: A swift and agile hunter who excels at striking from a distance. Her arrows rain down on enemies with precision and speed, targeting multiple foes at once.

name: Assassin
description: A deadly and elusive killer, dancing through the shadows to eliminate targets behind enemy lines with surgical precision and critical strikes.

name: Bard
description: A musical tactician who empowers allies with magical melodies. Their songs boost morale and speed, turning the tide of battle with rhythm.

skills.name: Battle Hymn
skills.description: Boost SPD for team for 2 turns.

name: Berserker
description: A ferocious warrior who channels fire into fury. The lower his health, the deadlier his rampage becomesâ€”unpredictable and unstoppable.

skills.name: Rage Strike
skills.description: Deals more damage as HP lowers.

name: Demonbound
description: A cursed soul wrapped in flame, the Demonbound slices through defenses with dark fire, fueled by forbidden power.

name: Druid
description: A guardian of nature, using water-infused rituals to restore vitality to the entire party. Durable for a support, with surprising resilience.

skills.name: Rejuvenation
skills.description: Heal over time for all allies.

name: Frost Knight
description: A disciplined warrior of ice whose armor deflects critical hits. Cold and composed, the Frost Knight slows battles to a crawl.

name: Gladiator
description: A fiery brawler forged in the arena. The Gladiator excels in brute force, battering the frontline and leaving enemies bleeding.

name: Healer
description: A serene and wise support unit, channeling calming waters to mend wounds and keep allies on their feet in the heat of battle.

name: Ice Witch
description: Cold and calculated, she bends frost to her will, binding enemies in place with chilling spells that freeze their actions and nerves alike.

name: Iron Golem
description: A towering earthen construct of raw defense and slow devastation. Its mighty slams shake the ground and pulverize enemies.

name: Knight
description: A stalwart defender rooted in the earth, the Knight excels at stunning foes and holding the front with honor-bound discipline.

name: Mage
description: A scholarly master of the arcane arts, wielding volatile lightning magic to devastate groups of enemies. Fragile, but devastating when protected.

name: Monk
description: A disciplined fighter who fuses martial prowess with lightning chi. The Monk balances offense and team support with inner calm.

skills.name: Chi Barrier
skills.description: Buff DEF for the whole team.

name: Paladin
description: A noble protector wielding holy lightning, the Paladin shields allies with divine might, absorbing blows with unmatched resilience.

name: Pyromancer
description: A volatile spellcaster who thrives on chaos. Her flames engulf enemies over time, creating panic and relentless pressure on enemy lines.

name: Sentinel
description: A mystical guardian radiating crackling energy. The Sentinel's spell-reflective aura punishes attackers and disrupts casters.

name: Sniper
description: A lone wolf with unshakable aim, trained to spot and eliminate vulnerable targets with deadly accuracy. A single shot can end a fight before it begins.

skills.name: Headshot
skills.description: High crit, chance to instantly KO weak targets.

name: Valkyrie
description: A divine warrior cloaked in frost. The Valkyrie descends upon the battlefield with chilling fury, cutting through foes with holy grace.

skills.name: Heaven's Wrath
skills.description: Hits all enemies in front line.

name: Warlock
description: A dark scholar who curses from afar, weakening enemies with infernal whispers. Not one for brute strength, but dangerous over time.
